00003 include_once("CMQueryProtocol.php");
00004 
00014 class CMMySQLQuery implements CMQueryProtocol {
00015  
00021  public static function Version() {
00022   return "1.0";
00023  }
00024  
00030  public static function Since() {
00031   return "1.0";
00032  }
00033  
00039  private $affectedRows = 0;
00040  
00044  private $result = false;
00045  
00051  private $driver = 'mysqli';
00052  
00056  private $a = array();
00057  
00066  public function CMMySQLQuery($r, $affected = 0, $driver = 'mysqli', $a = array()) {
00067   $this->result = $r;
00068   $this->affectedRows = $affected;
00069   $this->driver = $driver;
00070   $this->a = $a;
00071  }
00072  
00105  public function fetch($rowMode = 'assoc', $formatter = false) {
00106   if(isset($this->a['formatter']) && $formatter === false)
00107    $formatter = $this->a['formatter'];
00108    
00109   if(!$this->result)
00110    return false;
00111    
00112   if($this->driver == 'mysqli') {
00113    
00114    if($rowMode == 'assoc')
00115     $r = $this->result->fetch_assoc();
00116    elseif($rowMode == 'line')
00117     $r = $this->result->fetch_array(MYSQLI_NUM);
00118    elseif($rowMode == 'row')
00119     $r = $this->result->fetch_array(MYSQLI_BOTH);
00120    elseif($rowMode == 'pair') {
00121     $r = $this->result->fetch_row();
00122     if(!$r)
00123      return false;
00124     $r = array($r[0] => $r[1]);
00125    } elseif($rowMode == 'cell') {
00126     $r = $this->result->fetch_row();
00127     if(!$r)
00128      return false;
00129     $r = $r[0];
00130    } else $r = false;
00131    
00132   } else {
00133   
00134    if($rowMode == 'assoc')
00135     $r = mysql_fetch_assoc($this->result);
00136    elseif($rowMode == 'line')
00137     $r = mysql_fetch_array($this->result, MYSQL_NUM);
00138    elseif($rowMode == 'row')
00139     $r = mysql_fetch_array($this->result, MYSQL_BOTH);
00140    elseif($rowMode == 'pair') {
00141     $r = mysql_fetch_array($this->result);
00142     if(!$r)
00143      return false;
00144     $r = array($r[0] => $r[1]);
00145    } elseif($rowMode == 'cell') {
00146     $r = mysql_fetch_array($this->result);
00147     if(!$r)
00148      return false;
00149     $r = $r[0];
00150    } else $r = false;
00151    
00152   }
00153   
00154   // apply formatter
00155   if($formatter !== false)
00156    $r = $formatter->format($r);
00157   
00158   return $r;
00159  }
00160  
00185  public function fetchAll($rowMode = 'assoc', $direction = 'horizontal', $formatter = false) {
00186   if(!$this->result)
00187    return false;
00188   $r = array();
00189   
00190   if($direction == 'single')
00191    return $this->fetch($rowMode, $formatter);
00192   
00193   while($row = $this->fetch($rowMode, $formatter)) {
00194    if($direction == 'horizontal')
00195     $r[] = $row;
00196    elseif($direction == 'vertical') {
00197     if(is_array($row)) {
00198      foreach($row as $k => $v)
00199       $r[] = $v;
00200     } else $r[] = $row;
00201    } else return false;
00202   }
00203   
00204   return $r;
00205  }
00206  
00217  public function availableMethods() {
00218   return array('fetch', 'fetchAll', 'affectedRows', 'totalRows');
00219  }
00220  
00224  public function affectedRows() {
00225   return $this->affectedRows;
00226  }
00227  
00235  public function totalRows() {
00236   if($this->driver == 'mysqli')
00237    return $this->result->num_rows;
00238   return mysql_num_rows($this->result);
00239  }
00240  
00244  public function success() {
00245   return $this->result !== false;
00246  }
00247  
00251  public function __toString() {
00252   return "<" . get_class($this) . ">";
00253  }
00254  
00255 }
